item.description:
Bridges Meet and Mingle Dance Party
Friday, September 10.
8:00 PM to Midnight.

The Highlander Conference Center
2 Highlander Way
Manchester 03103
603-206-0629

Admission $15 before 9pm $17 after 9pm
Proper dress required: please no jeans, sneakers or, work boots.

Please join Steve O and Joan Dg7 and 100 - 150 people for an evening of dancing, drinks, hors oeuvres and, socializing in a tasteful setting. Meet and dance with a wide variety of people and ages; friends old and new. Complimentary hors dâ€™oeuvre buffet and cash bar.

Please come as close to 8pm as possible to mingle and be introduced. Because of the large number of people attending, it will be difficult for Steve O. to make introductions all evening.
DIRECTIONS: this locationis near the Manchester airport. It doesnt show up on all GPS. Go to www.highlanderinn.com for directions and follow "Dance Party" signs.

Hosts: Steve O. 603-491-1962 ob@tds.net & Joan 305-7114 ob@tds.net
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Meetup at the door & look for our Meetup signs on our tables.

group.name: Trailblazers- A Seacoast Singles Meetup Group

item.name: Bridges Meet & Mingle Dance Party
